page.title: 02MARGROVE PARK AND SLAPEWATH
page.content: MARGROVE PARK IS ONE OF THE FIVE RESIDENTIAL AREAS IN THE BLOCK. THE HOUSING IS MOSTLY SMALL TERRACED PROPERTIES AND TWO DETACHED BUNGALOWS. THERE ARE ALSO SEVEN HOLIDAY HOMES, A CARAVAN AND CAMPING SITE, A FARMHOUSE AND A DISUSED SCHOOL. THE VILL AGE NESTLES UNDER A WOODED HILLSIDE FACING EAST AND IS BUILT ROUND A VILLAGE GREEN. SLAPEWATH COMPRISES EIGHT HOUSES, THREE OF WHICH ARE DETACHED, THE REMAINDER BEING TERRACED AND AN INN WITH ACCOMMODATION. THE HAMLET HAS BEEN BYPASSED BY THE ARTERIAL ROAD, IT FACES SOUTH AND IS BUILT ON A HILLSIDE. MOST OF THE INDUSTRY IN THIS BLOCK IS TO BE FOUND IN THIS AREA.
